body:
Most of these are trivial but the `lshift_int` test looks like it could be a real issue (see also https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/21830). This is on cython-0.25.1:
~~~~
======================================================================
FAIL: lshift_int (line 137) (pyintop.__test__)
Doctest: pyintop.__test__.lshift_int (line 137)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/buildslave-sage/slave/sage_git/build/local/lib/python/doctest.py", line 2226, in runTest
l    raise self.failureException(self.format_failure(new.getvalue()))
AssertionError: Failed doctest test for pyintop.__test__.lshift_int (line 137)
  File "/home/buildslave-sage/slave/sage_git/build/local/var/tmp/sage/build/cython-0.25.1.p0/src/TEST_TMP/run/c/pyintop/pyintop.so", line unknown line number, in lshift_int (line 137)

----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/home/buildslave-sage/slave/sage_git/build/local/var/tmp/sage/build/cython-0.25.1.p0/src/TEST_TMP/run/c/pyintop/pyintop.so", line ?, in pyintop.__test__.lshift_int (line 137)
Failed example:
    bigints(lshift_int(-1))
Expected:
    (-8, -2147483648, -9223372036854775808, -10633823966279326983230456482242756608)
Got:
    (-8, -2147483648, -2147483648, -10633823966279326983230456482242756608)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/home/buildslave-sage/slave/sage_git/build/local/var/tmp/sage/build/cython-0.25.1.p0/src/TEST_TMP/run/c/pyintop/pyintop.so", line ?, in pyintop.__test__.lshift_int (line 137)
Failed example:
    (2**28) << 3
Expected:
    2147483648
Got:
    2147483648L
----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/home/buildslave-sage/slave/sage_git/build/local/var/tmp/sage/build/cython-0.25.1.p0/src/TEST_TMP/run/c/pyintop/pyintop.so", line ?, in pyintop.__test__.lshift_int (line 137)
Failed example:
    (2**30) << 3
Expected:
    8589934592
Got:
    8589934592L


======================================================================
FAIL: lshift_int (line 137) (pyintop.__test__)
Doctest: pyintop.__test__.lshift_int (line 137)

AssertionError: Failed doctest test for pyintop.__test__.lshift_int (line 137)
  File "/home/buildslave-sage/slave/sage_git/build/local/var/tmp/sage/build/cython-0.25.1.p0/src/TEST_TMP/run/cpp/pyintop/pyintop.so", line unknown line number, in lshift_int (line 137)

Failed example:
    bigints(lshift_int(-1))
Expected:

title: Testsuite failure on 32-bit linux
